        public Todo(int id,
    java.lang.String title,
    java.util.List<org.joda.time.DateTime> dateTimeList)
        Constructs a Todo of type: DEADLINE or EVENT. ASSUMPTION: dateTimeList is not empty or null and has only either 1 or 2 dates.
        Parameters:
        title - title of the task.

      • getDateTime

        public org.joda.time.DateTime getDateTime()
        Method to return a DateTime of the Todo for ordering them chronologically The order of preference: start time > end time > null
        Returns:
        start time for events; end time for deadlines; null for tasks.

      • compareDateTime

        public int compareDateTime(org.joda.time.DateTime first,
                  org.joda.time.DateTime second)
        Method to compare two DateTime objects at the minute resolution
        Returns:
        -1 if the first object is smaller (earlier), 0 if the two objects are equal, 1 if the first object is larger(later).
